extension_description.message: Made for your pleasure! On today's list are user subtitles and playlists, enhanced blogging and notifications!

popup_item_main_description.message: New series and episodes, a release calendar, a popularity rating

popup_item_tlog_description.message: Posts about future developments, errors and off-topic

popup_item_my_description.message: Account, balance and invitation management, your latest activity

notification_unseen.message: Time to relax! You have not yet seen $amount$ $word$!

notification_messages.message: So, somebody wrote you $amount$ $word$. What are you going to do?

notification_days.message: Watch out! You are running low — $amount$ $word$ left!

lists_context_create_title.message: Create new playlist and add this episode

settings_item_popup_enabled_title.message: Show Turbomenu, otherwise go to Turbik.tv

settings_item_popup_enabled_description.message: Choose preferable action to be executed when the badge is clicked. Applied immediately

settings_item_checker_enabled_title.message: Periodically request an amount of unseen episodes, private messages, etc.

settings_item_checker_enabled_descriptio.message: Increases internet traffic expenses. Applied immediately

settings_item_checker_updateInterval_des.message: Can be set from 1 minute up to 60 hours

settings_item_checker_showNotification_d.message: Notifications, informing about changes in counters

settings_item_checker_daysThreshold_desc.message: Can be set from 1 up to 365 days

settings_item_inj_index_hideUnfavorable_.message: Highlight favorite series in the future episodes calendar

settings_item_inj_myseries_futureRelease.message: Add favorite series from the future episodes calendar to My Series

settings_item_inj_allseries_info_title.message: Provide additional info for series on All Series

settings_item_inj_blog_enhanced_descript.message: Allows to navigate and compose messages with style in Series Blog, Turboblog and My Messages

settings_item_inj_blog_enhanced_navigati.message: Creates navigation bar for quick commentary selection

settings_item_inj_blog_enhanced_formatti.message: Applies formatting to comments, including hyperlinks, images, and BB-codes

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_descrip.message: Allows better viewing, custom subtitles support, usage of playlists and much more

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_hide_de.message: Hides episode description from under the player, can be opened from upper-right menu

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_hide_co.message: Hides user commentaries from under the player, can be opened from upper-right menu

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_hide_ep.message: Hides season or playlist episodes, can be opened via active bar on their place

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_topping.message: Hide top menu and remove footer
Hides main navigation menu behind a slider and removes footer totally

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_sidebut.message: Creates buttons on the sides of player that link to the previous and the next episodes

settings_item_inj_watch_enhanced_resize_.message: Uses screen space effectively to provide bigger viewving area

settings_item_inj_watch_playlists_title.message: Enable favorite series and user playlists

settings_item_inj_watch_playlists_descri.message: Playlists can be gathered from index page, My Series and individual series pages

settings_item_inj_watch_beforeclose_titl.message: Enable warning when you close or navigate away from Watch page

settings_item_inj_watch_beforeclose_desc.message: Prevents accidental closing when a video is still playing

settings_item_inj_global_inviteless_titl.message: Hide invite counter from header of all pages

settings_item_inj_global_inviteless_desc.message: Removes orange badge over an avatar image so it doesn't steal all attension

settings_item_inj_global_turbosearch_des.message: Provides integrated features available for Turbosearch users. Such as on-site search, custom subtitle upload and more. Registration guide is available at http://tfsearch.ru/register

settings_item_inj_global_turbosearch_pas.message: You can reset your password at the registration page. For safery reasons do not use the same password for both sites!

firsttime_subtitle.message: Choose your basic settings (you can tune them later):

firsttime_restore.message: Oh, we have found your older settings from previous version! Would you like to restore them now? Note, that not all the settings may translate exactly to the newer version. We'll try our best, though :)

firsttime_preset_watch_bp1.message: Commentaries and episode description won't catch your eye unintended

firsttime_preset_watch_bp2.message: Video player will fit exactly to your dimensions

firsttime_preset_watch_bp3.message: You can collect playlists all around the site

firsttime_preset_blogs_bp3.message: Messages are useful and beautiful, and spoilers are hidden well

firsttime_preset_turbosearch_bp1.message: Internal search engine is integrated on every page

firsttime_preset_turbosearch_bp2.message: Control your own subtitles from videoplayer

firsttime_preset_all_bp2.message: And many more of small, and some medium, features!
